Name: Passion Fruit Martini
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of passion fruit half.
Cut passion fruit in half and scoop out flesh into shaker.
Float the remaining passion fruit half for garnish.
Review: Simple but tasty, harnessing the flavour of passion fruit.
